S: You should be ashamed of your clamorous mouth!
Your mother raised you better than this!
I can't believe you are so dumb.
I hope that someday, somewhere, you will sit on a cactus.
Granola is smarter than you are.
I can tell that you enjoy hearing your own voice...
This is not a riddle... just SHUT UP!
For the love of all things... silence!
BEGONE, VILE BEASTE! SHUT THY MOUTH OF GOLD!
